mapper.select: SELECT es.event_schedule_id, es.event_id, es.venue_id, es.ticket_open_at, es.event_date, e.title AS title, v.venue_name AS venue_name FROM tb_event_schedule es JOIN tb_event e ON es.event_id = e.event_id JOIN tb_venue v ON es.venue_id = v.venue_id WHERE DATE(es.ticket_open_at) = CURDATE() LIMIT 9

SELECT es.event_schedule_id, es.event_id, es.venue_id, es.ticket_open_at, es.event_date, e.title AS title, v.venue_name AS venue_name FROM tb_event_schedule es JOIN tb_event e ON es.event_id = e.event_id JOIN tb_venue v ON es.venue_id = v.venue_id WHERE DATE(ticket_open_at) = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) LIMIT 8

SELECT es.event_schedule_id, es.event_id, es.venue_id, es.ticket_open_at, es.event_date, e.title AS title, v.venue_name AS venue_name FROM tb_event_schedule es JOIN tb_event e ON es.event_id = e.event_id JOIN tb_venue v ON es.venue_id = v.venue_id WHERE e.status = 'APPROVED' AND e.genre = #{genre} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
